fields.description2: Exolite 210 stretch double weave fabric give robust, comfortable performance and drys fast after a summer downpour. Four zipped pockets secure the essentials whether on the trail or travelling through mountain towns and an integrated belt sits comfortably under a pack.

fields.spec2: 180g fabric with semi-elasticated waist.
fields.spec3: Microfleece linked waistband for improved comfort.

fields.name: Storr Shorts
fields.description1: Our lightest stretch woven shorts for multi-day summer enchainments and year round training sessions.
fields.description2: These superlight, stretchy shorts are perfect for hot conditions. With an unrestrictive fit and fast drying time they're ideal for long sun baked ascents to high cirques or double session training days in preparation for big projects. A streamlined waist is comfortable wet or dry and won't chafe under a pack.

fields.spec2: 120g fabric with elasticated waist.

fields.name: Canna Boots

fields.description2: The Canna boots has a 1.8mm suede leather upper with Gore-Tex Performance Comfort lining. With the new Vibram Energy II sole, these boots are the perfect solution for three-season hiking, and is ideal for rainy days.
